Reviews.Author: talafiana singh
Reviews.Content: I bought this product before going on vacation to leave with family back home and they love it, they can skype me easily, facebook play games and use all kinds of other apps. They absolutely enjoy it and now more of my nieces and nephews would like one of their own too.. =) Very happy that they enjoy this product, enjoy my gift. I will definitely order more before my next trip... it just makes a perfect gift. works great. thanks so much
Reviews.Title: pefect gifts

Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: Great product for at home use. Whether it's just for entertainment or any other purpose. Great buy ! Would definitely recommend.
Reviews.Title: Easy to use

ProductInfo.Features:
Runs on the latest Android 4.2 OS which brings tons of new features to your Tablet. Install all of your favorite apps from the Google Play Store (included). Ability to side-load apps from SD card if you prefer.
Ready to go out of the box, Lightweight and easy to use. AllWinner A13, Cortex A8, Capacitive G-Sensor 5 Point Multi touch Screen.
Built In WiFi, Dual Camera, Latest Apps Compatible (Facebook, Twitter, Angry Birds, Netflix, YouTube)
4GB Flash storage (expandable to 32GB with micro SD card!). 512MB RAM (DDR3). USB Extendable (Flash Drives/HDD/External Keyboard/3G)
For Extended Warranty add the Square Trade Coverage to your investment to protect it from drops, damages and spills.
ProductInfo.Name: RED 7 Inch GOOGLE Android AllWinner Tablet PC, (4GB) Boxchip Cortex A8 1.2Ghz MID Capacitive Touch Screen G-Sensor WiFi, Camera, Skype Video Calling, NetFlix Movies, Flash Supported, By FastTouch(TM)
